title: Evaporative Control System – Engine Off

body.body: When the engine is stationary, any pressure increase in the fuel tank due to a rise in ambient temperature will cause the fuel vapour to pass down the breather pipe to a carbon filled evaporative canister that stores the vapour.
Once in the canister, vapour cannot return to the fuel tank because the purge valve is closed.

body.name: Evap control system engine off cjop _1

body.body: Engine OFF call out table DTC; D72; DT3; DT4; DU; DU3; DU4; DUY; DTB; DUB; DUC

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DUC; DUB; DTB; DTC; DT4; DU4; D72; DU3; DT3; DUY; DU
